mapper.sql:
where B.BRD_KIND = #{brd_kind} and B.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND B.ttl like concat('%', #{ttl} , '%' ) AND B.reg_dt >= concat(#{reg_fr_dt}, '000000') AND B.reg_dt <= concat(#{reg_to_dt}, '235959')
mapper.select:
/* board.mainBoardList */
select B.* , U.user_nm as reg_user_nm , (select nm from tb_code where REPR_CD = 'NOT' and CD = case when B.NOTICE_TYPE is null or B.NOTICE_TYPE = '' then 'NOT002' else B.NOTICE_TYPE end ) as notice_type_nm from tb_board B left outer join tb_user U on ( B.reg_user_no = U.user_no)
order by ifnull(B.top_notice_yn, 'N') desc, B.top_reg_no desc, all_reg_no asc
limit 0, 5
